label: A4B3_hP14_173_bc_c-001
title: $\beta$-Si$_{3}$N$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
\href{current_web_home_dir/A4B3_hP14_176_ch_h-001}{(Yang, 1995) places this structure in space group $P6_{3}/m$ \#176}. His structure is nearly indistinguishable from this one. 
 Si$_{3}$N$_{4}$ also exists as \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B3_hP28_159_ab2c_2c-001}{nierite, $\alpha$-Si$_{3}$N$_{4}$}. 
 Space group $P6_3$ \#173 allows an arbitrary choice for the origin of the $z$-axis.  We use this to set $z_{1} = 0$ for the N-I site.
